mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_identification, member_password, member_name, member_phone, member_email, member_drive_register_date, member_type) values (#{memberIdentification}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberDriveRegisterDate}, #{memberType})
mapper.select: select member_id from tbl_member where member_identification = #{memberIdentification}
select member_id from tbl_member where member_email = #{member_Email}
select member_id from tbl_member where member_password = #{memberPassword}
select member_id from tbl_member where member_identification = #{memberIdentification} and member_password = #{memberPassword}

select member_id, member_identification, member_name, member_phone, member_email, member_file_system_name, member_type, member_drive_register_date, member_point from tbl_member order by member_id desc
